message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you that its worth to you is significantly higher than the price I'm willing to accept. I'm confident we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us. Let's discuss further and explore the potential this product holds for you. What do you say?
